game.s_dis: Subway Surfers: Barcelona takes the endless runner action to the vibrant streets of Barcelona, playable online unblocked with new characters, boards, and collectibles.
game.l_dis:
Subway Surfers: Barcelona â€“ Dash Through the Iconic Spanish City

Subway Surfers: Barcelona immerses players in the lively streets and landmarks of Barcelona. Run, jump, and slide along colorful subway tracks, dodging obstacles, collecting coins, and special items.

What is Subway Surfers: Barcelona?

This edition is part of the World Tour series, featuring Barcelona-themed environments, characters like Diego, outfits such as "Chivalry," and a cultural board named "Stallion."

How to Play Subway Surfers: Barcelona?

  • Swipe Controls: Swipe up to jump, down to roll, left/right to switch lanes.
  • Collect Coins & Items: Gather coins, tokens, and other collectibles to unlock Weekly Hunt rewards like hoverboards and keys.
  • Dodge Obstacles: Avoid trains, barriers, and city-themed hazards while maintaining your run.
  • Use Power-Ups: Activate magnets, jetpacks, and hoverboards to extend your run and maximize your score.

Why Play Subway Surfers: Barcelona Unblocked?

Experience the beauty and culture of Barcelona in Subway Surfers: Barcelona online without restrictions, unlock new characters, outfits, and boards while exploring iconic landmarks and streets.

Key Features

  • Barcelona Environment: Explore sunny beaches, elegant buildings, mosaics, and iconic cityscapes.
  • Exclusive Characters & Boards: Unlock Diego, the "Chivalry" outfit, and the "Stallion" board.
  • Endless Runner Gameplay: Classic swipe-based controls with a cultural city twist.
  • Special Collectibles: Participate in Weekly Hunts for tokens and rewards.
  • Unblocked Online: Play instantly in your browser anywhere.

Master Barcelona's Subway Tracks!

Run, jump, and slide through Subway Surfers: Barcelona to beat obstacles, collect rewards, and enjoy the vibrant Spanish city environment!
